author: ohraemez
content: fix looks good. have not had any problems with this version for a week now.

author: jczh
content: hi guys, im looking for some help. im very new to this space, with very little knowledge... i am trying to connect to the kintsugi testnet from macOS. ive followed all the steps on https://hackmd.io/dFzKxB3ISWO8juUqPpJFfw#Connect-Geth-LH1 but im struggling to connect Geth to lighthouse. when i type the text into terminal i get the prompt "zsh: command not found: lighthouse".  what do i need to put before 'lighthose' to make this run?

author: stevencook
content: lighthouse needs to be accessible from your path - if you built it, you could move the lighthouse binary to `/usr/local/bin/` - you could also just copy the lighthouse binary to where you are running command and do `./lighthouse` instead of `lighthouse`

author: jczh
content: perfect thank you, will try now
